name: Salt Lake County Justice Court
address: 2001 S State St #4200, Salt Lake City, UT 84190

rooms.name: 1A
rooms.arrival_instructions: enter through the metal detector, stay on the first floor, find the west hallway, and find the room number above the door.

rooms.name: 2A
rooms.arrival_instructions: enter through the metal detector, go up the stairs or elevator to the second floor, find the west hallway, and find the room number above the door.
